scripts.zip: powershell -Command "if (Test-Path zip\lambda-sqs-consumer.zip) { Remove-Item zip\lambda-sqs-consumer.zip }; if (!(Test-Path zip)) { New-Item -ItemType Directory -Path zip }; Compress-Archive -Path dist\* -DestinationPath zip\lambda-sqs-consumer.zip"
scripts.build:optimized: npm run build && cp package.json dist/ && cp package-lock.json dist/  && cd dist && npm ci --omit=dev
scripts.build:aws: npm run build:optimized && npm run zip
